text: Wild in the Country is a 1961 American musical drama movie. It was directed by Philip Dunne. The movie is based on the 1958 book The Lost Country by J. R. Salamanca. Actors include Elvis Presley, Hope Lange, Tuesday Weld, Millie Perkins, Gary Lockwood, Christina Crawford, and Rafer Johnson. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * Category:1960s musical movies Category:1961 drama movies Category:American drama movies Category:American musical movies Category:Movies based on books Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by Philip Dunne Category:Movies set in Virginia
title: Wild in the Country
